distinct m_user.m_name
,p_order.m_id
,o_check
,p_name
,p_count
,p_date
FROM p_order, m_user

FROM
(
select
o_no
,m_id
,o_check
,p_name
,p_count
,p_date
,row_number() over(order by o_no desc) as numrow
,count(*) over() as totalcnt
from
p_order
order by p_date desc , o_check asc
)
